occupation: Chief Financial Officer at Highmark Interactive
headline: Senior Financial Executive
summary: Experienced executive with a unique combination of experience and expertise in partnering with Executive Teams of small and medium size companies.   Results oriented, bottom line focused approach with a successful track record of strategic change management, process improvement, financing and system implementation.

experiences.title: Chief Financial Officer
experiences.description: Highmark Interactive is a Canadian-based TSXV listed medical technology company with a focus on assessing neurological functional performance and how it is affected after mild traumatic brain injuries and other neurological diseases. Founded in 2017, Highmark’s mission is to use engaging digital health tools and hybrid care solutions to manage total brain wellness — for individuals, employees, patients  and athletes.

experiences.title: Director Information Technology
experiences.description: Motion Specialties is the leading provider of mobility and home accessibility products in Canada. Through a network of corporate and franchised stores, the businesses deliver comprehensive health care solutions to enhance the quality of life, increase mobility, and provide a safe and accessible environment for the home.  Motion Specialties is a Birch Hill Equity Partners portfolio company.

experiences.title: Chief Financial Officer
experiences.description:
Lone Wolf Technologies (a Vista Equity Partners portfolio company) is the North American leader in residential real estate software, with products in over 10,000 offices across Canada and the U.S. The company offers an ecosystem of technology products, including software for back office, transaction management, front office, and web, as well as professional services and 3rd party integrations. Each element of this ecosystem enables brokerages and agents to operate more efficiently, reduce costs, and increase opportunities for profitability. Lone Wolf’s head office is located in Cambridge, ON, with additional offices in Dallas, TX, Langley, BC, and London, ON.

Oversee the planning, implementation, management and control of all financial activities for the company. Work with the strategic senior management team to ensure a continued solid financial and administrative foundation to support the progressive growth at Lone Wolf.

experiences.title: Consultant
experiences.description:
Shoppers Home Health Care (a division of Shoppers Drug Mart) provides Canadians with the a selection of specialty home health care products and services, tailored to meet client's specific needs for health recovery and maintenance. With over 62 locations, Shoppers Home Health Care is Canada's largest retailer of home health care products and services.

As a consultant with extensive industry experience, partner with the senior leadership team to plan, manage and implement projects designed to improve operating efficiencies and developing change management strategies.

experiences.title: Chief Financial Officer (Contract)
experiences.description:
GeoDigital International Inc. provides utilities and other distributed asset customers with mission critical, geospatial information management solutions in North America, Australia and India.

As a member of the senior leadership team managed a high growth business plan to expand the use of proprietary technology across multiple market channels and geographies with a focus on cash conservation, vendor negotiations and financing.

experiences.title: Chief Financial Officer
experiences.description:
Intelliware is a private custom software development services company and a leading practitioner of Agile software development practices which ensure the delivery of timely, high quality solutions for their clients.

As the only non-equity member of the senior leadership team acted as a sounding board for all key strategic and operating decisions.  Designed and implemenedt strategies, processes and systems to enable the business to achieve profitable growth.

experiences.title: Chief Financial Officer
experiences.description:
Prism Medical Ltd. is a multi-national publicly traded company operating in the UK, Canada and the USA specializing in manufacturing and distributing products and services to assist with moving and handling the disabled.

Partnered with the CEO to help transition Prism from an investment holding company to a medical products and services provider.

experiences.title: Interim Chief Financial Officer (Contract)
experiences.description:
MKS was a publicly traded software company with operations in Canada, USA and Germany in need of new management and financing.

Partnered with Interim CEO and senior management team to stabilize and restructure the business.

experiences.title: Senior Vice President and Chief Financial Officer
experiences.description:
Atlantis was a software and flight simulation company in the process of completing an initial public offering (IPO).

Partner with the CEO and senior management team to profitably expand the business operations to new geographic markets.  The rapidly changing economic conditions facing the technology sector created survival challenges for the company requiring the implementation of cash conservation and new financing strategies.

experiences.title: Chief Financial Officer and Corporate Secretary
experiences.description:
Vitalaire Healthcare is the largest provider of respiratory services and products in Canada to the homecare and institutional markets with over 60 branches.

As a member of the executive team transitioned the company from a small privately owned regional home oxygen business to a national institutional medical gas and home oxygen division of a multi-national company.
